column2: The petitioner in this case was an intervenient in to the said partition
action  on  the  basis  that  his  land  was  also  included  in  to  the  partition
If the petitioner's rights have been infringed by the respondents by
entering in to  this amicable partition deed,  he has to  go  for  civil  litigation

column1: to  vindicate  his  rights.  We  refused  to  issue  notice  and  dismissed  this
